content: I'm actually considering getting a PS5, mainly because I've been a PlayStation fan for a while and I'm excited about the exclusive titles like Godfall and Spider-Man: Miles Morales. Plus, I've heard great things about the DualSense controller and the Tempest Engine for 3D audio. But at the same time, I'm also curious about the Xbox Series X and its features like Quick Resume and Smart Delivery. I might have to do some more research and compare the two consoles before making a final decision.
